channel.title: Stock Growth on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Stock Growth on FinanClub

item.title: CFLT
item.description: score:138 Chances: Confluent has rallied 50% in February, fueled by better-than-expected fourth-quarter earnings and an optimistic outlook. Rising data streaming adoption can drive solid growth for Confluent. The release of the Confluent Migration Accelerator program is expected to jumpstart organizations’ data streaming journeys and lower the barrier to migration.
